description: The skin of this slugcat is a creamy white. Two unblinking, pure-black eyes watch you as you approach, shining with inhuman curiosity and intelligence. It grasps a spear in one paw.

special_attacks.hit_dmg_u: %1$s thrusts a spear at your %2$s, stabbing it!
special_attacks.hit_dmg_npc: %1$s thrusts a spear at <npcname>'s %2$s, stabbing it!
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s thrusts a spear at your %2$s, but glances off your armor!
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_npc: %1$s thrusts a spear at <npcname>'s %2$s, but glances off armor!
special_attacks.miss_msg_u: %s thrusts a spear at you, but you evade it!
special_attacks.miss_msg_npc: %s thrusts a spear at <npcname>, but they evade it!

description: A young creamy-white slugcat, not yet fully grown. It grasps a spear in one paw as it examines its surrounding with an uncanny curiosity.

special_attacks.hit_dmg_u: %1$s thrusts a spear at your %2$s, stabbing it!

special_attacks.miss_msg_npc: %s thrusts a spear at <npcname>, but they evade it!

description: The skin of this slugcat is off-yellow. It carries a small grenade in one paw.
The skin of this slugpup is a slightly paler yellow than its adult counterpart. It seems flighty.
The skin of this slugcat is a brilliant light red. You notice that it carries its spear slung over its back. It seems more aggressive than others of its kind.

description: A young hunter slugcat, with a spear slung over its back. It scans the landscape for potential threats - or a meal.

description: The slugpup is near-invisible in the dark, save for its vague outline and piercing white eyes. Being young, its eyes do not seem to be fully developed - but it is still nonetheless capable of night vision.

description: A mutated test subject with translucent skin. Their irises have dilated immensely, and under the slime-stained jumpsuit you catch glimpses of squirming, tumor-like cysts.
